column2: Florence Nightingale Letters at the Clendening Library :
column3: Letter to Mrs. Chalmers .Dated October 2, 1866 .Page 3 of 12. . . . . .there in a state equally .corrupt of mind & body .(if I may phrase it so). .One leg was amputated .and for nearly 3 weeks he was .literally kept alive on .Champagne wine ...
